InstructionData.Title: PR - Pressure Relief
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Pressure Relief # PR # https://github.com/dtandersen/stationeers-library
alias Sensor d0 alias Pump d1 alias setting r2 # process variable alias actual r4 # actual pressure #alias setpoint r5 # desired pressure alias error r6 # setpoint - actual #alias p r7 alias temp1 r8 alias count r9 alias lasterror r10 alias errorsum r11 # integral error sum define Kp 20 define Ki 5 define stacksize 20 define multiplier -1 define setpoint 50000
loop: yield bdns Sensor loop l actual Sensor Pressure
# error = setpoint - actual sub error setpoint actual mul error error multiplier # caculate error sum # sum resides on stack mod sp count stacksize add sp sp 1 pop lasterror # subtract the last error sub errorsum errorsum lasterror # add the current error add errorsum errorsum error push error add count count 1
# setting = error * Kp + errorsum * Ki mul setting error Kp mul temp1 errorsum Ki add setting setting temp1 s db Setting setting
bdns Pump loop blez setting off s Pump On 1 s Pump Setting setting j loop off: s Pump On 0 s Pump Setting 0 j loop
